H0.text: What synthetic fiber is used in most bulletproof vests. Nylon

H1.text: What synthetic fiber is used in most bulletproof vests. Polyester

H2.text: What synthetic fiber is used in most bulletproof vests. Dyneema

H3.text: What synthetic fiber is used in most bulletproof vests. Kevlar

A4.text: Kevlar is used in bulletproof vests.

A5.text: In 1971, Lester Shubin, who was then the director of Science and Technology for the National Institute for Law Enforcement and Criminal Justice, suggested using Kevlar to replace nylon in bulletâ€‘proof vests.
